text: :wave: I'm not sure I fully understand what you're trying to do. Could you give some examples?

for sure; so lets say I have a property that can hold multiple values

i want to take that property and generate a toggle Group from the options

to do this, I have to loop and split the options (i think, its been a few days) and then map over that new array to produce the options

wasn't sure if there's a function or something that eliminates the initial loop and split and is "just smart enough" to know to seperate by ";" and generate options that way

...if that makes anymore sense lol
hmmm I'm not sure if we have anything like that
is this just due to how the properties are structured?
Seems like just some js utility functions should do the trick
Yeah, splitting the ; can be unsafe with end users but yeah that works too lol

<@U04N6N424MB> just to be clear, you mean these are <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/properties/property-field-types-in-HubSpot#:~:text=Multiple%20checkboxes%3A%20stores%20checkboxes%20that%20contain%20several%20options.%20This%20is%20an%20enumeration%20property.%20Learn%20more%20about%20technical%20limits%20of%20enumeration%20properties.|custom multi-select property values> for one of your CRM objects?
Okay, perfect, thank you for the info :pray:
